content:
# I encountered another error while trying to craft the Iron Gear Wheel. 
# This is because I need to use a crafting machine to craft items that require intermediate products like Iron Plates.

# Since I need to craft an Assembling Machine first, I will need to smelt more Iron Ore into Iron Plates to gather the necessary materials.

# I will return to the Stone Furnace, insert 10 Iron Ore, and wait for it to smelt into Iron Plates.
insert_item(Prototype.IronOre, furnace, quantity=10)  # Insert 10 Iron Ore into the Stone Furnace.
print(f'Furnace status after inserting more iron ore: {inspect_inventory(furnace)}')  # Check the furnace status. 

# Now, I will wait for the smelting process to complete again.
for _ in range(30):  # Maximum 30 seconds wait
    if inspect_inventory(furnace)[Prototype.IronPlate] >= 5:  # Check if I have produced enough Iron Plates.
        break
    sleep(1)
else:
    raise Exception("Smelting timeout - check fuel and inputs")

# Once smelting is complete, I will check the results.
print(f'Final Furnace status: {inspect_inventory(furnace)}')
print(f'Final Inventory: {inspect_inventory()}')  # Check the final inventory after smelting.
